descriptions: Deck the halls with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This stunning set includes a prelit Christmas wreath with pine cones and red berries, two Christmas garlands with warm yellow LED lights, and two festive red Christmas bows. Made of high-quality PE synthetic fir, this set is perfect for adorning front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, and more. With a battery-operated power source, you can easily hang these wreaths and garlands anywhere in your home, shop, hotel, or at your Christmas party. Don't miss out on this beautiful and versatile holiday decor set!

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. This set includes 1 lighted Christmas wreath with pine cones and red berries, 2 Christmas garlands with warm yellow LED lights, 2 festive red bows, and a metal hanger for easy display. Crafted from high-quality PE synthetic fir, these decorations are perfect for adorning front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves. With a garland length of 106 inches and a wreath diameter of 17.72 inches, these stunning pieces are sure to make a statement in your home. Battery operated for convenience, this set is ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties. Add a touch of festive cheer to your holiday decor with the Yingzhao Christmas Wreath Set.
